comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan for linking the other photos of Eddie Plank, and catching the actual date.  We'll make the change next time we update the record.

comment.author: 61983549@N00
comment._content:
Plank only pitched Oct. 8 and Oct. 11 during the 1913 World Series. It couldn't have been taken on Oct. 13, as the World Series finished up on Oct. 11.

Also, the poles in the grandstands appear to be Shibe Park, which would make this from game two of the World Series on Oct. 8, 1913. Plank appears to be warming up for that game, which Philadelphia lost, 3-0, in 10 innings. Christy Mathewson was the winning pitcher.
